    Uncertainty Quantification (UQ) and Sensitivity Analysis (SA)

    This is an R package that performs parameter estimation, uncertainty quantification, and global sensitivity analysis using Bayesian methods, MCMC sampling and variance based decomposition methods.

    • Source code: https://github.com/icpm-kth/uqsa/

    The Articles on this page are a user guide to this package. As always, the function reference is also accessible within R (?uqsa::ABCMCMC), after installation. See Get Started for detailed installation instructions.

    if (!require(remotes)) install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("icpm-kth/uqsa",dependencies=TRUE)

    We have built a toolset for model building, automated code generation and simulation around this package. The functinality of the entire toolset is covered on this page, not only this R package.
